# repeating

**Type Property**

A default set of effect options that prefers to repeat indefinitely.

## Declaration

```swift
static var repeating: SymbolEffectOptions { get }
```

## Configuring repeating effects

- **repeating**: A set of effect options that prefers to repeat indefinitely.
- **nonRepeating**: A set of effect options that prefers to not repeat.
- **nonRepeating**: A default set of effect options that prefers to not repeat.
- **repeat(_:)**: Creates a set of effect options with a preferred repeat count.
- **repeat(_:)**: A default set of effect options with a preferred repeat count.

items.description: A set of effect options that prefers to repeat indefinitely.
items.name: repeating

items.description: A set of effect options that prefers to not repeat.
items.name: nonRepeating

items.description: A default set of effect options that prefers to not repeat.
